definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Top 8 of the preliminary will fight for the bonus on Apr.14 and 15 in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 初赛八强将于4月14日和15日在首尔进行决赛。

sentences.english: Uzbekistan has reached the last eight of the Asian Cup for the third time, while China was eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 至此，乌兹别克三进八强，而中国队遭小组出局。

sentences.english: A goal the U. S. team lost to Ghana, overtime, missed the South Africa World Cup quarterfinals.
sentences.chinese: 美国队加时赛一球惜败于加纳，无缘南非世界杯八强。

sentences.english: Ninety percent of the Asian players managed to win the first round, but all lost the second.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲选手九成都晋十六强，但全与八强无缘。

definition: (sports) to go out of bounds/to go over the line/to qualify for the next round of competition/(Tw) (fig.) to make the grade/to achieve success
an upset (esp. in sports)/unexpected turn of events/to pull off a coup/a breakthrough
to defend the crown (in sports championship)
to lose to (sb)/to be outdone by
